name: egeloen/http-adapter

suggest.doctrine/cache: Allows you to use the cache event subscriber
suggest.ext-curl: Allows you to use the cURL adapter
suggest.ext-http: Allows you to use the PECL adapter
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: Allows you to use the Guzzle 3 adapter
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Allows you to use the Guzzle 4 adapter
suggest.kriswallsmith/buzz: Allows you to use the Buzz adapter
suggest.nategood/httpful: Allows you to use the Httpful adapter
suggest.psr/log: Allows you to use the logger event subscriber
suggest.rmccue/requests: Allows you to use the Requests adapter
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: Allows you to use the event lifecycle
suggest.symfony/stopwatch: Allows you to use the stopwatch http adapter and event subscriber
suggest.tedivm/stash: Allows you to use the cache event subscriber
suggest.zendframework/zend-http: Allows you to use the Zend 2 adapter
suggest.zendframework/zendframework1: Allows you to use the Zend 1 adapter

description: Issue HTTP request for PHP 5.4.8+.
